org.openimaj.ml.linear.learner.matlib.loss

Class LossFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.linear.learner.matlib.loss.LossFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MatLossFunction, MatSquareLossFunction

    public abstract class LossFunction
extends Object
    With a held Y and X, return gradient and evaluations of a loss function of some parameters s.t. J(W) = F(Y,X,W)
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
